programme.title: Project Runway S21
programme.desc: The designers saddle up for a wild ride as their next challenge requires them to create a modern take on western chic.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: When a scientific expedition to an uncharted island awakens titanic forces of nature, a mission of discovery becomes an explosive war between monster and man.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan decides to free Marianne and journeys to Sarawak to find his real parents. Sandokan and Marianne are captured by a rogue Dayak tribe, which happens to be Sani’s. Yanez and crew are also caught while tracking Sandokan. Forced to fight a cobra to prove his Dayak heritage, Sandokan is poisoned but survives, gaining the tribe’s acceptance. Meanwhile, Brooke and Murray defy orders and follow Sandokan’s trail.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe’s chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang’s jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak’s struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne’s father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Shuttle Discovery's Last Mission
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Summer means food is plentiful and this year's youngsters must feed, grow and prepare to start life alone. For puffins it's a massive leap of faith as they jump from their cliff-top nests into the ocean.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In the Atlantic's far north, autumn is the season of gales, cooling temperatures and driving rain. This is when the wildlife must make the final preparations for winter or migrate to warmer climes.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: Narrated by acclaimed English actor Bill Nighy, this blue-chip natural history series reveals the challenges faced by the astounding and rare creatures that make this unique environment their home.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: Adam Liaw continues his culinary tour of Japan, preparing fresh sushi and taking a trip to his wife's hometown to indulge in a little home cooking.

programme.title: Air Warriors S7
programme.desc: Adam Liaw continues his culinary pilgrimage in Japan, devouring some of the finest miso, Nagoya chicken and Wagyu beef, and meeting a 74-year-old abalone diver.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In the vast urban sprawl of Tokyo, Adam Liaw explores a food culture that not only sustains the `salaryman' workers in style but retains culinary traditions.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw checks out the restaurants of food-crazy Tokyo and taste's some interesting dishes including Yakitori made from the reproductive organs of chickens.

programme.title: Destination China: Yunnan
programme.desc: Adam meets a tea master, a Maiko, and a Michelin chef who turns risotto into sushi in the thriving traditional culture of Kyoto.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Adam Liaw explores Japan's high-energy financial centre, Osaka, and finds the world's best fast food, a sumo wrestler turned chef, and soba noodles to die for.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: A merger of megastar music. Discover the true story of multi-genre performer and fashion promoter, Beyonce Knowles and the world's first hip hop billionaire, Jay-Z.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali, the greatest fighter ever, remains a global icon. His name still commands respect. Hear from those who knew him, relive his legendary fights, and explore the life of boxing’s greatest symbol.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: From their teeth, and claws, to incredible stealth and cunning, nature’s most lethal predators have evolved a staggering array of hunting techniques.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: Oceans Africa
programme.desc: Baby Animals: Protecting babies against extreme conditions, hungry predators, and the threat of starvation, all animals must fight for the future of their species.

programme.title: Wildest Survival S2
programme.desc: The instinct to secure a mate is one of the most powerful that there is. From the beautiful to the bizarre, this episode explores the most amazing mating rituals from right across the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: This episode explores the world’s most toxic animals, revealing how poison and venom have given them the edge over the competition in their fight for survival.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: This episode explores how nature’s toughest animals have adapted to the extreme conditions in some of the planet’s most inhospitable environments.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the last great war of the 20th century, with a casualty rate in the tens of thousands. Through it all, military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.

programme.title: Visionaries ft. Keanu Reeves
programme.desc: Days before Christmas in 1988, one of the worst air disasters in history occurred over Scotland. Pan Am Flight 103 exploded at 31,000 feet, falling in fiery sections of wreckage that tragically changed the hillside town of Lockerbie forever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants – and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either – which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: CSI S5 E19 - 4x4
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: In our modern world, we tend to think that technology and scientific knowledge can help protect us from almost anything, including natural disasters. But is that really true?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Who was Jack the Ripper? The question has baffled police investigators, historians, and armchair detectives. Countless books, movies, and television shows were based on the Ripper's murderous exploits.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)

programme.desc: Daniel Braganza,a leading hatchetman of a crime syndicate.He was a killer totally bereft of conscience that he earned the nickname "Markadong Hudas".

programme.title: Dunkin Donato

programme.title: Pablik Enemi 1 N 2: Aksidental Heroes
programme.desc: Redford White and Dennis Padilla team in this fast paced wacky adventure as two bumbling idiots on the run after accidentally picking up a suitcase full of smuggled goods.

programme.title: Alyas Baby Tsino (Tatagos Sa Puso)
programme.desc: It’s a world where greed and violence is the rule. It’s world where one has to go with the flow in order to survive. And for a man who stick by his guns, it’s worse than hell. He must risk his life and even those he cares for in order for all of them to get out of the dark hole well and alive.

programme.title: Afuang: Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Abner Afuang is an honest to goodness cop who labors to keep the honor of his badge. Fighting ruthless criminals, he has acquired the fury of the syndicates he is fighting.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Manila Boy
programme.desc: Robin, as Manila Boy, played the bad boy image but tries to deviate from it by being a soft-hearted specie among the throngs of the city. He had an open heart for the needy and women were easily charmed by his down-to-earth attitude.

programme.title: Kailan Sasabihing Mahal Kita? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is all about a marriage,which started on the wrong foot. Compromised by her boyfriend, Sharon agreed to marry family friend, Christopher, in order to save face.

programme.title: Unang Tibok
programme.desc: Alona (Miya Nolasco) feels suffocated by her mother's overprotectiveness. Deprived of male company, she answers the first guy who counts her. In trying to control her daughter, the more she is losing her now.

programme.title: Totoy Golem
programme.desc: Way back in the late 50's one of the most feared names on the streets of Manila was that of Totoy Golem of the then, notorious district of Tondo.

programme.title: Ex-Rebel
programme.desc: Concerned with his pregnant wife Saling, rebel leader Ka Leon decides to take advantage of the government's amnesty program to rejoin society. But Ka Leon's past catches up with him.

programme.title: Palabra De Honor (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia headed this all-star cast in a searing drama about a millionaire patriarch and the power he wielded among the people in an entire town.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NHK WORLD TV Special program
programme.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

programme.title: 1/1000: Lay Judges
programme.desc: 1 in 1000 Japanese have experience as a lay judge in court cases. We witness a networking event for former lay judges, where they discuss unique experiences. What does it feel like to judge others?

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week: cool R&B-rooted J-pop from girl duo Natsudaidai; and EDM-influenced rock from THE SIXTH LIE. Both acts are in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: This program is an animation series about a Japanese dog, Charo. He meets and is helped by many mythical creatures of Northern Japan as he searches for eight star talismans. Tohoku series 1-2.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: People in Japan use roughly 150 new cardboard boxes a year. In a 5-minute digest, we examine a broad range of Japan's innovative cardboard products, including waterproof packaging and emergency goods.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: A scallop fisherman's cat, Miya, keeps watch while her owner is at sea. Once he's back, Miya's ready to cuddle. Meanwhile, a cat in Hachinohe City sits on her owner's newspaper to get his attention.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION
programme.desc: Explore the world of anime sound! Voice actor Otsuka Akio recreates past sessions, revealing techniques behind iconic lines. And in the studio, composer Inai Keiji works on a new anime score.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: Shirakawa-go is one of Japan's snowiest regions, famous for its traditional thatched-roof Gassho-style homes. Every detail of life here is reflected in the cooperative bond shared by residents.

programme.title: OKINAWA: The Holiest Place
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from January 17, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Putri-san, from Indonesia, works entirely in Japanese, but finds some katakana words difficult. By receiving guidance from experts, she'll learn how to politely ask someone to repeat something.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Artisan Matoba Kensho restores traditional dolls. Beyond cleaning, he repairs damage to faces. Well-cared-for dolls can last 100 years, so he hopes people bring them to him, and never discard them.

programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents…

programme.title: 7ujuh
programme.desc: 7 friends go on a road trip to a remote bungalow run by a village head and his daughter Suri. They host a party and ask Suri to help. Things spiral out of control and Suri is raped. Before killing herself, she curses them to be haunted in their dreams. As the friends are killed off one by one, they must break the curse to escape their deadly fate.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Murder In The 21st

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A young man is arrested for violating a restraining order by sending a text message. While in Virginia Beach, an 18-year-old woman is arrested for assault and battery after a fight with her brother.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: A popular lifeguard is found dead at the community swimming pool, causing a wave of terror to flood through Leawood, Kansas.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: Tara Grinstead's sudden disappearance goes unexplained for 11 years until a surprising statement to law enforcement from Bo Dukes, a former student, names his friend and former classmate as her killer.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: Detective Angela Carter takes over the case of a missing teenage girl and wonders if the key to her disappearance could lie shockingly close to home.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The family of a DUI victim screams at the defendant; a Sovereign Citizen argues with the judge over bond; a sexual assault victim is interviewed by her attacker in court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: The judge must excuse the jury after an accused double-murderer goes on a rant; DUI defendant won't listen to her lawyer; laundromat vandal tries to suck up to the judge; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A rookie detective is pushed to the brink searching for a beloved man who ultimately turns up brutally murdered. Bringing the killer to justice could hang on the testimony of a jailhouse informant.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Elizabeth Thomas Story with Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: Five years after she was groomed and abducted by the most popular teacher in school, Elizabeth Thomas shares new revelations about her ordeal, with famed kidnapping survivor Elizabeth Smart.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: 18-year-old Nicole Brown meets 30-year-old OJ Simpson while working as a hostess, sparking a whirlwind romance. Despite appearing as the perfect wife and mother, Nicole endures OJ's abuse in private.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: After years of torment, Nicole files for divorce, embarking on a new chapter that includes a risky affair with one of OJ's close friends. But a failed reconciliation led Nicole to a final, fatal stand.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A 21-year-old man is charged with domestic terrorism after a spree of shootings on the freeway sends the public into panic. Facing over 100 years in prison, the young father claims he has an alibi.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Edward Ates takes a polygraph test with former FBI agent George Olivo in a bid to show his innocence. He spent 20 years behind bars for the murder of his neighbour—a crime he says he didn’t commit.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a young woman dies in a car crash, it's up to the Coroner's Office to trigger an investigation into an accident that may have involved foul play.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a man is shot dead, pathologist Dr. Antoine Wrice works with investigators to interpret unusual evidence found on the scene and unwind the complex case that could be more than a typical homicide.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ça
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les 3 Mousquetaires
programme.desc: Charlotte, Olivia, Inès and Isa lead a double life: ordinary girls at court, training in secret to be the best fighters in the kingdom. The 3 Musketeers, that's them! Bound by an unbreakable friendship, they foil plots and protect the king from his enemies.

programme.title: Les Triplés
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Manolo is ready to go off on his holiday camp when the school informs him that he has failed his maths exam. Vic receives an answer concerning her request for a scholarship: she can go to New York.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada

programme.desc: Welcome to the first pan-African competition dedicated to entrepreneurs! Sixteen candidates will be selected to join the Station; ten of them will face a panel of investors in the grand final.

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Welcome to the French West Indies, exploring two overseas territories with diverse natural treasures. In Guadeloupe, discover the breathtaking landscapes of the ''Island of Beautiful Waters.'' Then head to Saint Martin, an island half French, half Dutch...

programme.title: Itinéraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Opj

programme.desc: In a fictional South American country in 1907, after the death of her father, an Irish terrorist, Maria joins a travelling music-hall show which offers her a place as a Parisian duettist. programme.title: Au Revoir Jérôme !
programme.desc: Newly arrived in heaven, Jérôme sets off in search of his wife. He gradually finds himself falling ever-deeper into a colourful but totally surrealist world where no-one seems able to help him.

programme.title: L'Affaire Jeanne D'Arc
programme.desc: 1456. Twenty-five years after Joan of Arc's death at the stake, a rehabilitation trial is opened by Jean Bréhal.
